sentence.Network_en: He grows tulips in the flowerbed in his garden.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在他花园的花坛里种植郁金香.

sentence.Network_en: The dog left the flowerbed at sixes and sevens.
sentence.Network_cn: 这条狗把花坛践踏得乱七八糟.

sentence.Network_en: He put his great foot on the flowerbed.

entry.def: A flowerbed is an area of ground in a garden or park which has been specially prepared so that flowers can be grown in it.

means.word_mean: 1. a bed in which flowers are growing
